greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of parts in all partitions of n with largest multiplicity k; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
example: T(6,1) = 8: partitions of 6 with largest multiplicity 1 are [3,2,1], [4,2], [5,1], [6], with 3+2+2+1 = 8 parts.
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, [1, 0], `if`(i<1, [0, 0],
mathematica: b[n_, i_, k_] := b[n, i, k] = If[n == 0, {1, 0}, If[i < 1, {0, 0}, Sum[b[n-i*j, i-1, k] /. l_List :> {l[[1]], l[[2]] + l[[1]]*j}, {j, 0, Min[n/i, k]}]]]; T[_, 0] = 0; T[n_, k_] := b[n, n, k][[2]] - b[n, n, k-1][[2]]; Table[Table[T[n, k], {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 12}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 27 2013, translated from Maple *)
xref: Main diagonal and first lower diagonal give: A001477, A063524.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 27 2013
